title: Game bug when change masteries
body:
Hi, riot. Recently, this a really serious bug when I change masteries. The game will send an error message whenever I name or rename my masteries. And after this I can't change my masteries page any more and have to relog in to change.
Can you help me with this? 
Thank you :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try deleting all of your mastery pages and re-making them from scratch.

Let me know if this helps.
